description:
Nase Hiroomi is the eldest son of the famous underworlder Nase family and http://anidb.net/ch50833 [Mitsuki]`s elder brother. It appears that Hirooumi and http://anidb.net/ch50835 [Akihito] had something happen between them in the past, but now they are on such good terms that they can joke around with each other. He has a big sister complex. Due to his barrier powers as an underworlder, he is extremely sensitive to cold, and is almost always seen wearing a muffler or scarf. Hiroomi is a third-year student in high school.
Source: ANN
name: Nase Hiroomi
